remarks: ` _E ` induction schema, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 10-Mar-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement:
setinds2f.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
setinds2f.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
setinds2f.3 $e |- ( A. y e. x ps -> ph ) $.
setinds2f $p |- ph $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
